channel.title: Court Wizard Overhaul Idea
channel.description:
**Court Wizard** _________________________________________ **Blue Dragon, Support**
**Magic Barrier:** Protect a player from all negative effects and conversion. Does not protect from attacks. Blocks occupation, conversion, target changes, Mind Warp, and Frame. Unlimited uses.
**Magic Amplification:** Choose a target, and another person. The first target's ability used that night will be duplicated onto the second person. This ability counts the Court Wizard as visiting both targets. The first target will receive a notification saying, "Your ability was Amplified by a Court Wizard." The first target will receive the result of that ability. The Court Wizard will receive only a notification of success or failure. 2 uses.
**Sage** _________________________________________ **Unseen, Support**
**Barrier Magic:** Protect a player from all negative effects. Does not protect from attacks. Blocks occupation, target changes, Mind Warp, and Frame. Shows effects as successful to originating players. Unlimited uses.
**Wall of Fire:** Summon a wall of fire at a player's door, preventing everyone but the Assassin from visiting them. 2 uses.
**Ritualist** _________________________________________ **Cult, Support**
**Will of Mithras:** (Passive) If you are sacrificed, the Cult Leader's _Eradicate_ ability will gain an extra charge.
**Whispers of Mithras** (Day ability) If a member of the Cult dies today, the Cult Leader's _Brainwash_ ability will be removed from cooldown tonight. 1 use.
**Brotherhood:** Make a Cult member appear as Blue Dragon tonight. 3 uses.
**Blood Barrier:** Protect a player from negative effects. Does not protect from attacks. Blocks occupation and target changes. 1 use.
